casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Eddie Lamar TAYLOR. No. 719A05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 6, 2006. Daniel Shatz, Anne M. Gomez, Assistant Appellate Defenders, Peter Strickland, Lillington, for Eddie Taylor. William Hart, Senior Deputy Attorney General, Thomas H. Lock, District Attorney, for State.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 5th day of October 2006 by Defendant for Motion for extension to serve proposed record:

"Motion Allowed. Defendant shall have up to and including the 13th day of November 2006 to serve his/her proposed record upon the district attorney. The parties shall then proceed to settle and file the record on appeal pursuant to the provisions of Appellate Rules 11 and 12. By order of the Court in conference this the 6th day of October 2006."
